# CPU_BASED_RDPMC

**Global Variable**

The value that controls whether the execution of Read Performance Monitoring Counters instructions (RDPMC) cause VM exits.

## Declaration

```swift
var CPU_BASED_RDPMC: UInt32 { get }
```

## Discussion

Must be `1`.

## Capabilities

- **PIN_BASED_INTR**: The value that controls whether external interrupts cause VM exits.
- **PIN_BASED_NMI**: The value that controls whether external non-maskable interrupts cause VM exits.
- **PIN_BASED_VIRTUAL_NMI**: The value that controls blocking of non-maskable interrupts.
- **PIN_BASED_PREEMPTION_TIMER**: The value that controls whether the VMX-preemption timer counts down in VMX non-root operation.
- **PIN_BASED_POSTED_INTR**: The value that controls whether the processor gives special treatment to interrupts with posted-interrupt notification vectors.
- **CPU_BASED_IRQ_WND**: The value that controls whether a VM exits at the beginning of any instruction where there’s no blocking of interrupts and the interrupt flag is 1.
- **CPU_BASED_TSC_OFFSET**: The value that controls whether reading the timestamp-counter MSRs changes depending on the value of the timestamp-counter offset field.
- **CPU_BASED_HLT**: The value that controls whether the execution of HALT instructions cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_INVLPG**: The value that controls whether the execution of invalid page instructions (INVLPG) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_MWAIT**: The value that controls whether the execution of Monitor Wait instructions (MWAIT) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_RDTSC**: The value that controls whether the execution of Read Timestamp-Counter instructions (RDTSC) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_CR3_LOAD**: The value that controls whether executions of MOV to Control Register 3 (CR3) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_CR3_STORE**: The value that controls whether executions of MOV from Control Register 3 (CR3) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_CR8_LOAD**: The value that controls whether executions of MOV to Control Register 8 (CR8) cause VM exits.
- **CPU_BASED_CR8_STORE**: The value that controls whether executions of MOV from Control Register 8 (CR8) cause VM exits.
